title: Re: pop pop pop pop pop pop
content:
Although the lack of ABPs and Partials (those slightly bother me) helps, this never really worked for me, since I simply miss the Buddy Bubbles too much.

Oh, for the previously uninformed:
[url=http://www.virtual-bubblewrap.com/bubbleinfo.shtml]www.virtual-bubblewrap.co...info.shtml[/url]Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

Talking about silly Flash stuff, here's one quite classy one I stumbled upon sometime back;
[url=http://www.ebaumsworld.com/flash/bubblegirl.html]www.ebaumsworld.com/flash...egirl.html[/url]
It's fun if you have sadistic tendencies. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mort.gif[/img] Would be better if the female had long flowing hair, but well, can't have anything. Oh, and cracking of bones would be plus. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!
